name: Deal with it!
description:
Hi! Felor, Sergio, Samu and Roque presents you "Deal With It!".

It was made following the GMTK Game Jam 2020 theme: Out of control. We thought to do a game on a shopping center on sales, where the shoppers get out of control.

The main objective is to get three deals in the shortest time possible. But try not to crash with the obstacles!

CONTROLS:

A or Left Button -> Left movement

D or Right Button -> Right movement

If you hold the key 2 seconds, you will rotate 90º!!
